data.name: Atlantis Royale
data.detailed_description:
Update Notes

We use Discord for Patch Notes. To have access you must download the game and click on the Discord button


About the Game

Atlantis Royale is a Multi Game type game for 2 to 50 players in online and local multiplayer. Knock down your friends or AI with super power or incredible ability in multiple modes and help destroy friendships.

ONLINE AND LOCAL MULTIPLAYER

Play as you want. Atlantis Royale allows 2 to 50 players to compete online or in a local game. Whether online or in person, it's a fascinating game to ruin friendship. Also with a Training Mode to train solo with AI.

THE POWERS

Buy your super powers at the start of each game start in the Shop using the points you have earned during the different games.

IA

Have you already ruined all your friendships or just need to occupy places? Atlantis Royale includes full AI integration, so you can play or train with any number of real players.

data.short_description: ATLANTIS ROYALE is a Multi Games! You can play as many Game Modes as you like among friends or other players. Discover our Battle Royale, Deathmatch and also our INFERNAL Mode !!! With fun and varied gameplay and extraordinary powers and abilities.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i3 2.4 Ghz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: Core i7 2.5 Ghz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
